lines.text: To be, or not to be? NOT to be... THAT is the ANSWER!
We get the strangest people in here.
Sorry folks, but the neighbors complained about the noise.
But this is a holiday, and a very special holiday for the Addams family, everyone here is a relative.

[brings in the crooks]
I'm sorry you're mistaken, Morticia, these two aren't.
Well... Bones Lafferty, and Louie the Lard?
You must be mistaken officer, these people are family.
[Fester shakes his head]
No, we - we just said that... we're not members of this family. They've got a lion, a lion! In the basement, and a lady flew out the window!
That was no lady, it was a pterodactyl.

[an explosion is heard from the kitchen]
Did you leave a cake in the oven, Mama?
It's that woman again! That's my kitchen, not an airport!

[Fester has him on the rack, mistaking him for Gomez]
I'm just a guest here, take off my mask and you'll see.

An imposter! That's the first mistake I ever made on the rack, if I stretched you out, I could see about having you shortened. And if your socks are stretched, I'll be very happy to knit you a new pair.
Don't step on Kitty Kat's tail.
Do I look like the kind of guy who'd step on Kitty Kat's tail?
[leaves, Kitty Kat roars and Mikey returns terrified and his clothes torn]
You stepped on Kitty Kat's tail.

[to the relatives in the graveyard]
I want to apologize to you all, I almost gave up the old broom and fly recipe. I was wrong, I forgot the old family motto, "Never say die!"
[buried relatives applaud]
Thank you, well, back to the drawing board.
This is Mr. Grim, show him the house.
He's in it.

[a plant is choking Mikey]
Lois! How can he holler if you keep hugging him like that?
I found him! I found him! He was hiding.
I was not hiding, I was meditating.
In the dumbwaiter?
Hurry and dig yourself out, Uncle Fester, I'm going to tell the children the legend of Cousin Shy.
[repeated line]
Don't step on Kitty Kat's tail!

[opening a present]
An umbrella, Tish you know me like a book.
I was afraid the weather would be terrible. You know how horrid sunshine is, I shall pray for clouds.

[freeing Lafferty from the encircling leafy fronds while irritably scolding the plant]
How many times has Gomez told you NOT TO PLAY WITH STRANGERS?

[singing]
Christmas and Easter bring wonderful treasures/spirits and pumpkins bring far greater pleasures.
